column2: Call upon the tribes to unite to invade [Title.GetBaseName].
Send your [GetChancellorName] to pacify a province, reducing desire for rebellion but also reducing economic productivity in the process.

Send your [GetSpymasterName] to conduct subterfuge in a province, committing technological and military espionage, as well as discrediting local authorities and addling relations between them and their liege.

ocus his attention in the local people of note in the province, increasing the chance of intrigue events against the nobles as well as reducing the risk of rebellion by containing subversive elements.
column3: Demandez à votre Maître-Espion de se concentrer sur les nobles locaux d’un comté afin d’augmenter les intrigues initiées contre eux.
column4: Lasst Euren Agentenführer sich auf die hiesigen Adligen in einer Grafschaft konzentrieren, was die Chance auf Intrigen-Ereignisse gegen sie erhöht.
column6: Haz que tu jefe de espías centre su atención en los nobles de un condado, lo que aumenta la probabilidad de eventos de intriga contra ellos.
